abraham_md.config package¶

Submodules¶

abraham_md.config.constants module¶

constants.py: Constants for the application.

class abraham_md.config.constants.Constants¶

Bases: object

Constants for the application.

Notes

This class contains constants used throughout the application. By storing constants in a single location, it is easier to manage and update them. Constants should be defined as class attributes and should be named in uppercase with underscores separating words.

LOGGING_DATE_FORMAT = '[%X]'¶
LOGGING_FORMAT = '%(message)s'¶
LOGGING_LEVEL_DEFAULT = 'INFO'¶
LOGGING_TRACEBACKS = True¶

abraham_md.config.dialogue module¶

dialogue.py: Dialogue for the application.

class abraham_md.config.dialogue.Dialogue¶

Bases: object

Dialogue for the application.

Notes

This class contains dialogue used throughout the application. By storing dialogue in a single location, it is easier to manage and update it. Dialogue should be defined as class attributes and should be named in uppercase with underscores separating words.

DIRECTORY_NAMING_ERROR = 'Invalid directory name: {}'¶
EXIT_TEXT = 'Exiting Abraham...'¶
INTRO_TEXT = 'Welcome to Abraham!'¶
INVALID_PATH_ERROR = 'Invalid path. Please try again.'¶
INVALID_STRUCTURE_ERROR = 'Invalid directory structure. Please try again.'¶

abraham_md.config.paths module¶

paths.py: Contains paths for the application.

class abraham_md.config.paths.Paths¶

Bases: object

Paths for the application.

Notes

This class contains paths used throughout the application. By storing paths in a single location, it is easier to manage and update them. Paths should be defined as class attributes and should be named in uppercase with underscores separating words.

TEMPLATES_PATH = PosixPath('/tmp/tmpfyfwwd97')¶
temp_dir = PosixPath('/tmp/tmpfyfwwd97')¶
classmethod temporary_clone(directory_to_clone: str) → None¶

Create a temporary clone of a directory.

Parameters:

  • cls (Paths) – The class instance.

  • directory_to_clone (str) – The directory to clone.

Notes

This method creates a temporary clone of a directory.

abraham_md.config.structures module¶

structures.py: Contains data structures for the application.

class abraham_md.config.structures.Structures¶

Bases: object

Data structures for the application.

Notes

This class contains data structures used throughout the application. By storing data structures in a single location, it is easier to manage and update them. Data structures should be defined as class attributes and should be named in uppercase with underscores separating words.

DIRECTORY_STRUCTURE_REGEX = {'handbook': '^Module Specification.pdf$', 'lectures': '^\\d{1,2}.pdf$', 'module': '^[A-Z]{3}\\d{4} [A-Za-z]+(?:\\s+[A-Za-z]+)*$', 'papers': '^(202\\d{1}|MOCK\\d{1}).pdf$', 'practicals': '^\\d+.pdf$', 'tutorials': '^\\d+.pdf$'}¶
